amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from coverage of the bill any class action that is brought for harm caused by a tobacco product.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 3 printed in the Congressional Record to exempt any class action that is brought for harm caused by a tobacco product.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 266 (Roll no. 440).
